attributes.action: provide each and every taxpayer in the UK with the following items by way of a new benefit, to be know as "essential working expenses benefit"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To carry out their jobs effectively, every working taxpayer in this country requires the following items as a basic essentials. 

(Some people may not have realised this, but now our MPs have made it clear that they are in fact essentials, it explains why UK productivity is not all it could be - our workers do not have the basic essentials wholly and exclusively necessary for them to perform their work duties.)

To remedy this situation, each working UK taxpayer should be provided a one-off benefit to pay for the following items.

1. A moat.

2. A pond with housing for ducks. 

3. A plasma television.

4. An elephant-shaped lamp. 

5. Several bags of manure.

6. As many lavatory seats as necessary.

7. Hanging baskets.

8. A trouser press.

9. A leather rocking-chair

10. Treatment for dry rot.

EDITORS - Whilst my petition DOES contain humour, it does make a serious point about government policy. Considering you allowed the following petition - http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/nightclubcheese/ I think your rejection of my petition is odd. If you reject it again, I would like a full explanation of why you allowed the nightclub cheese petition please.

rejection.details: The petition you refer to was accepted in error.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
